September 15, 1942
Mr, Prank E, Schooley
Executive Secretary-
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
Station WIIL, University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
At this mometh there is some uncertainty as to
whether we would do more harm than good if any publicity
was given to our position or if any wires were sent along
the line we agreed upon, !Ehe whole matter is being held
up for a while and therefore, there is no need for any
immediate action. Of course 1*11 keep you advised as soon
as I get word.
Can you send me the names of the people who
attended the session; especially those who were at the
Saturday session, afternoon, as well as the name of the
music professor who participated in the discussion?
Very sincerely yours,
Director
MSNjsd
NEW YORK
WORLD’S FAIR 1940
"New York City's Own Station"—810 Kc.
